titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should award the Presidential Medal of Freedom to Martha Raye.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Declares that the President should award the Presidential Medal of Freedom to Martha Raye in honor of her meritorious service to the United States.
